about_the_game: The Expeditions: Rome soundtrack, composed by Hollywood and Game composer Thomas Farnon, features 29 incredible tracks of exclusively live-recorded music, using 2 orchestras and a range of talented soloists, for over an hour of listening pleasure.
detailed_description: The Expeditions: Rome soundtrack, composed by Hollywood and Game composer Thomas Farnon, features 29 incredible tracks of exclusively live-recorded music, using 2 orchestras and a range of talented soloists, for over an hour of listening pleasure.
legal_notice: © 2022 THQ Nordic AB, Sweden. Developed by Logic Artists. Expeditions, THQ and their respective logos are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of THQ Nordic AB. All rights reserved. All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners.
name: Expeditions: Rome - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 158 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 696 MB available space

short_description: The Expeditions: Rome soundtrack, composed by Hollywood and Game composer Thomas Farnon, features 29 incredible tracks of exclusively live-recorded music, using 2 orchestras and a range of talented soloists, for over an hour of listening pleasure.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German*, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
